description:
gc: describe debugging flags

The change to -m is the only one necessary
to close the issue.  The others are useful
to know about when debugging but shouldn't
be in the usage message since they may go
away or change at any time.

Fixes issue 2802.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

sorry i made this one http://codereview.appspot.com/5605052/, maybe we
can merge them :-)

On Wed, Feb 1, 2012 at 13:13,  <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5606046/

Luuk van Dijk <lvd@google.com> once said:
> sorry i made this one http://codereview.appspot.com/5605052/, maybe we
> can merge them :-)

I've incorporated your changes into this CL
and fixed the description for -s.  Feel free
to take my changes and submit them with your
CL ... or I can submit this one.  :-)

Cheers,
  Anthony

For the most part these are intentionally undocumented.  I'd like to review
this list tomorrow. Thanks.

LGTM

Looks good with the below tweaks.
I didn't realize all those new lines
were comments the first time I read it.

Thanks.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5606046/diff/7002/src/cmd/gc/lex.c
File src/cmd/gc/lex.c (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5606046/diff/7002/src/cmd/gc/lex.c#newcode153
src/cmd/gc/lex.c:153: print("  -N disable optimizer and escape analysis\n");
s/optimizer and escape analysis/optimizations

http://codereview.appspot.com/5606046/diff/7002/src/cmd/gc/lex.c#newcode162
src/cmd/gc/lex.c:162: print("  -m print diagnostics about escape analysis and inlining\n");
print optimization decisions

*** Submitted as acbd6cb237b8 ***

gc: describe debugging flags

The change to -m is the only one necessary
to close the issue.  The others are useful
to know about when debugging but shouldn't
be in the usage message since they may go
away or change at any time.

Fixes issue 2802.

R=lvd, rsc
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5606046: gc: describe debugging flags
